name: Halo CE VCop
description:
The project I developed in 2017, inspired by Sega's VituaCop series, the game is currently being updated and fixed (2021).

The game is developed from the Halo 1 engine, with an open license from the Halomaps community.

The game consists of 3 parts (VCop 1 - 2 - 3), based on the original game of SEGA, with modifications and additions to suit Halo's resource pack.

The game has completed VCop 1, you can download it from the homepage.

The website is written entirely in Vietnamese, you can use a web translation tool suitable for the language of each country.
